name: Upstatement
headline: Design-driven strategy and web development for a host of different high-profile companies.
paragraphs: At Upstatement, I helped multiple high profile brands transform their digital presence. During my time there, I worked to add live streaming to Chris Kimball's Milk Street's site,  built a new Shopify store for Titoâ€™s Vodka and developed two intricate and complex information hub sites for Shorelight, a company focused on promoting US universities to international students.

head.title: Upstatement - Camden Phalen
head.description: Design-driven strategy and web development for a host of different high-profile companies.
